author: cippy
body:
Optimized CPU timing of ECAL Pi0 stream for CMSSW_8_1_X, following request in [0]. Changes involve HLTRegionalEcalResonanceFilter::calcPairCluster(...) and 
HLTRegionalEcalResonanceFilter::doSelection(...) methods.
Tested on ZeroBias2016 dataset: CPU time reduced by a factor
-  ~ 50% in Barrel
-  ~ 65% in Endcap
  with respect to original code (referred to in [0]).

These further changes in code follow those in the pull request #14359 

[0] https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-741

@emanueledimarco @shervin86 @crovelli
title: Optimization of ECAL Pi0 stream timing
